data.expected_result: No message overlay with the "You must be in the server for..." text in the chat box and no message stuck.
data.short_description: Message gets stuck and overlays the "Read only" text when mentioning while it says You must be in the server for at least 10 minutes to write
data.steps_to_repro: - Get to a server with that "write lock"- Hold an users message long - Press "Mention"
